hint.text: The size of each sector is proportional to the activity or information it represents.

solution.text:
Observe the pie chart carefully,
the students spends \(25\) percent of the total amount for purchasing wood.
Total expenditure on wood \(=\frac {25}{100} \times _{j}_\)
\(=_{{(Decimal(str(0.25)))*j}}_\)
Therefore, the maximum expenditure on a single item is Rs.\(_{{(Decimal(str(0.25)))*j}}_\).
